name: Youtube - No More Recommendations!
description: Are you bored of irrelevant recommendations and weird videos that have nothing to your interests? This style simply removes the annoying recommended videos section from the home page of youtube.
additional_info:
Youtube - No More Recommendations! Author: ylwghst Current Version: 0.1b/25-Feb-2016
------------------------------------------------------------------------
0.1b/25-Feb-2016
  • This is a first initial release, it just works.
  • Hides the recommendations on home page.
  • Keeps showing popular videos when you aren't logged in.
